job.title: Big Data Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Big Data Engineer</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>About Us</strong></p><p><br></p><p>At Wevision, we build services, data platform, AI and machine learning-based optimization engines to&nbsp;&nbsp;automate the whole software development process. Our tenet is to build a strong tech team to deliver E2E solutions covering tech areas ranging from research, big data, micro services to data applications with front-end tools.Come join our team at Wevision, a fast-growing startup dedicated to building AI and machine learning-based optimization engines to automate software development and implementation.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities </strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Design, architect, develop, scale, and improve our data platform and its services</li><li>Implement large-scale high-throughput solutions using on-premise and cloud technologies such as Kafka, Spark on Hadoop/Hive/S3, AWS Lambda, Terraform, Kubernetes, etc.&nbsp;</li><li>Participate in novel solutions to challenging technical problems, introduce new technologies to our data platform and its services&nbsp;</li><li>Diagnose and debug issues in development, staging and production environments</li><li>Collaborate with product/program managers, software developers and analysts in an open, creative environment</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Below is the expected technical skills, experiences etc:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Strong programming (Scala/Java) and shell scripting skills</li><li>Experience with batch processing technologies like Apache Spark</li><li>Ability to explore and analyze datasets using SQL</li><li>Experience in Software Development Lifecycle and its activities&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Some Nice-to-haves:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Experience with real-time processing technologies like Apache Spark/Flink</li><li>Experience with and/or knowledge of CI/CD pipelines</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Job type: Full time, Contact</p>
